pkgmetadata.longdescription: Efficient Outlier Detection for Large Time Series Databases // Programs for detecting and cleaning outliers in single time series and in time series from homogeneous and heterogeneous databases using an Orthogonal Greedy Algorithm (OGA) for saturated linear regression models. The programs implement the procedures presented in the paper entitled "Efficient Outlier Detection for Large Time Series Databases" by Pedro Galeano, Daniel Pea and Ruey S. Tsay (2025), working paper, Universidad Carlos III de Madrid. Version 1.1.1 contains some improvements in parallelization with respect to version 1.0.1.
